summary: PublicLayout.tsx updates show the header logo/brand area wrapped in a TanStack Router <Link to="/"> with an aria-label and focus-visible styling, satisfying the header “logo acts as Home” behavior via client-side navigation. The diff snippet is truncated before the footer, but the generated frontend file summary claims the footer logo/brand was also wrapped in a Link to “/”.

missing_requirements.requirement: Make the footer logo/brand area in frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx also navigate to the main homepage route (/) when clicked, matching the header logo behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided PublicLayout.tsx diff is truncated before the footer section, so there is no direct code evidence in the snippet showing the footer logo/brand click target was updated to a client-side Link/button with accessible labeling.
